attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description: The background color of the progress bar, as hex code or named color.

attributes.name: fill-color
attributes.description: The color of the progress bar, as hex code or named color.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Height of progress bar, in px

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: Whether the progress bar is in an indeterminate state.

attributes.name: percent-complete
attributes.description: How full the progress bar is. 0 is empty, 100 is full.

attributes.name: secondary-fill-color
attributes.description: The secondary color for the striped progress bar, as hex code or named color.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Width of progress bar, in px (fits to container by default)

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color of the progress bar, as hex code or named color.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: The color of the progress bar, as hex code or named color.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height of progress bar, in px

properties.name: indeterminate
properties.description: Whether the progress bar is in an indeterminate state.

properties.name: percentComplete
properties.description: How full the progress bar is. 0 is empty, 100 is full.

properties.name: secondaryFillColor
properties.description: The secondary color for the striped progress bar, as hex code or named color.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of progress bar, in px (fits to container by default)
